name: Japan
interestingFact: Japan is home to more than 6,800 islands and has the world's oldest company, Kongo Gumi, founded in 578 AD.

name: Brazil
interestingFact: The Amazon rainforest, located in Brazil, produces 20% of the world's oxygen.

name: Australia
interestingFact: Australia is the only country that is also a continent and is home to more kangaroos than people.

name: India
interestingFact: India has the world's largest democracy and the largest postal network, with over 1.5 lakh post offices.

name: Canada
interestingFact: Canada has more lakes than the rest of the world's lakes combined.

name: Egypt
interestingFact: Egypt is home to the Great Pyramid of Giza, the last remaining of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

name: Italy
interestingFact: Italy is credited with the invention of pizza, which originated in Naples in the 18th century.

name: South Africa
interestingFact: South Africa has three capital cities and is known as the 'Rainbow Nation' for its diverse cultures.

name: United States
interestingFact: The U.S. is the only country to have landed astronauts on the Moon.

name: New Zealand
interestingFact: New Zealand was the first country to grant women the right to vote, in 1893.
